message.content: {"id": "42225", "title": "Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", "description": "When trying to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace in the keybinding manager, it displays Ctrl+Del instead. This issue occurs on a Swiss German keyboard with Swiss German locale.", "OB": "The expected behavior is that Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.", "EB": "Instead, the keybinding manager thinks Ctrl+Backspace is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.", "SR": "To resolve this issue, the keybinding manager should correctly recognize Ctrl+Backspace and allow it to be assigned to a command."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '42225', 'title': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", 'description': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace ", 'OB': '', 'EB': 'I20030827Out of the box Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word. ', 'SR': 'Somehow the keybinding manager thinks this is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.If I try to reassing the key via key pref page it displays Ctrl+Del when I pressCtrl+Backspace.I have a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale. '}
